name: promisify-event-rcv
description:
This Node.js module gives the simple capability of wrapping almost any kind of function inside an event handler for a given Event Emitter and an event name. 
Then it returns a promise that resolves when the event has been edtected, and optionally rejects on a given timeout or when the 'error' event is detected. 

This is quite a common pattern on my day to day job and have been so usefull so I decided to publish it.
author: Murillhou
